Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: '"...The wolf\'s cub was left alone in the depths of the den."'}
{3: '"...The disaster was so sudden that it lost its parents\' protection. It was so weak that it was abandoned by the pack before it even learned to hunt."'}
{3: '"As the frigid Arctic winter approaches, it must learn to hunt on its own if there is any hope for it to survive through the months of darkness."'}
{3: "In Cerberus' dark base, familiar voices and music can be heard intermittently coming from deep within. It seems to be a documentary as part of Babylonia's general education."}
{3: '"A small shadow appears on the endless tundra. It\'s a migrating lemming separated from the group while foraging."'}
{3: '"For a lemming, separation from the group is certain death."'}
{3: '"But for the wolf cub, it now has a chance of survival."'}
{3: "The narrator's voice echoes in the empty room. Following the source of the sound, you see a small figure huddled in front of the bright fluorescent screen."}
{3: 'Unable to see clearly in the darkness, you walk in the direction of the faint light from the terminal.'}
{3: '"...Step by step, the lemming approaches the seemingly fertile meadow. The white wolf cub huddles behind a nearby stone, awaiting the opportunity to pounce."'}
{3: 'Walking around a series of messy tables and chairs, you arrive at the source of the sound.'}
{3: "It's a small space made of supply crates and tables. An old audio-visual terminal is laying on the ground in the center of the space, playing a popular nature documentary from the Golden Age."}
{3: 'Although this is the source of the sound echoing in the room, the figure you had just seen is now gone.'}
{3: "You can't help but lower your gaze at the content playing on the audio-visual terminal. Who put it here?"}
{3: '"The white wolf waits quietly for the lemming to approach, every muscle ready to pounce."'}
{3: '"Hunting is a primal instinct engraved in the wolf\'s DNA, allowing them to capture their prey with impeccable speed and accuracy."'}
{3: 'You heard a light "thud" from behind. A white figure runs by in the dim light.'}
{3: 'For a moment, you feel the cold gaze of a wild animal staring at you. You turn around and quickly draw your gun—'}
{3: '—to see a pair of gray eyes looking at you.'}
{3: 'The lights in the room turn on.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Buddy, do not attack.'}
{3: "A small female Construct hangs upside from the ceiling, her baggy sleeves swaying. The girl's face hovers in front of you. Her long white hair dangles down, revealing her smooth forehead."}
{3: 'Caught off guard, your hand holding the gun freezes midair.'}
{3: 'Something rubs against your leg... No. 21\'s inseparable Co-Bot circles around you, bearing its "teeth and claws," ready to attack.'}
{3: "No. 21's legs sway gently, and she lands silently in an elegant pose."}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "You've crossed the boundary.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This is my territory.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Following her gaze, you lower your head and see a line forcibly scratched into the ground with what appears to be a weapon.'}
{3: 'The "boundary" is an arc on the ground, enclosing the space.'}
{3: 'You holster your gun and take a few steps to the side, away from the small "nest" made of supply crates.'}
{3: 'As you step further away, No. 21 visibly relaxes.'}
{2: 'Hanging from the ceiling?', 3: '46'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Captain said you like to be greeted this way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "So, that's why I greeted you like that.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Next time, just say "Hi" like normal.', 3: '49'}
{3: 'No. 21 looks down and records in her terminal, "Gray Raven Commandant Greeting: Normal".'}

{3: 'The audio-video terminal that you had previously ignored lets out a sharp noise as if wanting attention. The documentary turns into a mosaic of unknown significance, and an intermittent buzz comes from it.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I\'m using it to "study" information outside of battle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '...But it glitches each time it reaches this point.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 picks up the audio-visual terminal, holds it in front of her and shakes it as if trying to repair it with some "percussive maintenance."'}
{3: "You don't know if she hit any buttons, but the noise and picture returns to normal."}
{3: "No. 21's eyes gleam as she holds the terminal."}
{3: 'The video on the terminal seems to continue to play, but—'}
{3: 'The migrating animals walk backward quickly, and the lemming regurgitates the plants it had just eaten. Even the gentle voice of the narrator becomes a strange, quiet whisper.'}
{2: "Uh... Looks like it's rewinding...", 3: '63'}

{3: "No. 21 quietly stares at the screen as if she doesn't notice anything wrong. Right at that moment, an adult white wolf on the screen enthusiastically rescues a fallen deer and sends it back to the herd."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The white wolf is back home.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It was all alone, but now it's with its pack.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 turns the terminal to face you. The documentary rewinds to before the wolves had abandoned the wolf cub.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It finally found "home."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The documentary stops right after the wolf cub is born. The little cub snuggles up beside its mother.'}
{2: 'Do you like the documentary?', 3: '74'}
{2: 'You were watching it.', 3: '76'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want to keep watching it. Does that mean I "like" it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You could say that.', 3: '78', 4: 'For you, I think so.', 5: '78'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'All I know is what I "dislike."', 4: '1'}
{2: "You'll know soon enough.", 3: '80'}
{3: 'No. 21 mulls over your words, then nods.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Do you have a new mission here, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Captain hasn't issued us any new missions recently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "When we aren't on a mission... I don't know what to do.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Looking at No. 21's inquisitive gaze, Vera's slightly cryptic expression comes to mind."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{2: 'Observation?', 3: '91'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Got that right.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The higher-ups said that No. 21 has been going haywire in battle recently. She's become a liability. We've been pulled out of duty, so she can be put under observation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'There are also rumors going around that she clashed with members from the other teams... And was even getting into fights here in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's a misunderstanding!", 3: '95', 4: "What?! That's not true!", 5: '95'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Obviously. I'll spare you the REAL tinfoil hat conspiracies, but this is all just in a day's work for us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera sneers briefly before suddenly giving an icy glare.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "But No. 21 ain't like me and Noctis.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What she wants...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What she wants?', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Forget it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The point is, people are advocating for No. 21 to be re-evaluated for combat thanks to all this bull****. They're all lining up outside our door.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If she's taken away in her current condition... Think it'll just be all rainbows and sunshine?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If they decide that she's unfit for battle via remote link, she'll be kicked out of Cerberus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "What do you think they do with Constructs that have M.I.N.D. issues and can't be deployed in combat...? As a Chief, I'm sure you get the gist.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Rather than let those dimwits decide the fate of my team, it's better to find someone to get this over with ASAP.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But I can't do it by myself...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So... I want you to help No. 21 run some combat simulations to prove that she won't go haywire anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Are you really that dense, or are you just playing dumb?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21 started going nuts ever since you last remote linked with her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You got her into this mess. Don't you think you should be the one to get her out of it? Hm, Gray Raven Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 started going haywire after you remotely connected with her.'}
{3: "Those memories and emotions from your memory replays might still be affecting No. 21's M.I.N.D."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Seeing as you're so quick to accept, listen up—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If you're the reason why I lose such valuable member of my team, I'll cut you to pieces.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You got that?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Returning to your senses, you see No. 21 staring at you.'}
{2: 'I need your help collecting data from some combat simulations.', 3: '126'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Combat simulations?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 suddenly tenses up.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Is it an experiment?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just some routine frame tests.', 3: '132'}
{2: "I'll just be there with you this time.", 3: '133'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Why you, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera asked me to do it.', 3: '135'}
{2: "She's worried about you.", 3: '136'}
{3: "Even though she didn't come right out and say it."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Understood. If it's a mission from the captain, I'll do my best.", 4: '1'}
